Text:
1) Open "Counter-Strike Source"
2) Open "Counter Strike Source-2010-DiGiTALZONE.exe" and Install the game.

3) Open "Counter Strike Source_Patch 18.5.exe" and Install in the same folder where you installed "Counter Strike Source-2010-DiGiTALZONE.exe".

4)Run the game from shortcut named "Counter-Strike Source".

5)Enjoy!
